about_the_game: There is a "tree" here, which forever stands in this place, incapable of doing anything on its own, yet you can shake it. When you do, the tree will drop various fruits, which you can pick up and place in your inventory（<u>When the numbers on the time sign all turn green and display "0", please use the left mouse button to click and hold the "tree trunk". Then, vigorously and rapidly shake the mouse with large movements until the fruit falls off.</u>）; these are the fruits of your efforts in shaking the tree. Once the tree has dropped its fruits, it enters the next phase. You must wait quietly, as it will take several days before you can harvest your next yield. If time passes and you do not collect your fruits, they will remain on the tree forever. After the tree has provided you with fruits several times, it will disappear, leaving behind a stump that evokes nostalgia. But do not worry, it will reappear.
detailed_description: There is a "tree" here, which forever stands in this place, incapable of doing anything on its own, yet you can shake it. When you do, the tree will drop various fruits, which you can pick up and place in your inventory（<u>When the numbers on the time sign all turn green and display "0", please use the left mouse button to click and hold the "tree trunk". Then, vigorously and rapidly shake the mouse with large movements until the fruit falls off.</u>）; these are the fruits of your efforts in shaking the tree. Once the tree has dropped its fruits, it enters the next phase. You must wait quietly, as it will take several days before you can harvest your next yield. If time passes and you do not collect your fruits, they will remain on the tree forever. After the tree has provided you with fruits several times, it will disappear, leaving behind a stump that evokes nostalgia. But do not worry, it will reappear.
name: TimeKeeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 , AMD Equivalent configuration
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750-Ti , AMD RX 550, 2GB VRam
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is an idle casual game where you can shake the tree pole again when the number on the time board turns green and shows "0" to drop fruits from the tree. When you can shake the pole again, you'll find that several days have passed.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
